forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. Northeast wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. North northeast wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the city awakens under the blanket of early morning, a gentle haze lingers outside, a reminder of the marine influence so characteristic of this coastal gem. Overnight, a storm of clouds drifted through, leaving behind a cool embrace with temperatures resting around 47 degrees. As dawn unfolds, the forecast promises a radiant transformation—the sun will ascend, casting its warm glow and pushing temperatures toward the mid-50s, though an afternoon chill may accompany a subtle retreat.

Though the skies will clear into a bright expanse, the veils of fog seem to be taking a gradual bow, with more clarity unveiled towards the east and northeast. The stillness of the air, marked by the lightest of breezes—the whisper of two miles per hour—makes it a day worth venturing outdoors. The atmosphere is pleasantly calm, inviting a simple stroll through the streets of the city or a leisurely exploration of the marina, perhaps enjoying a cup of coffee at a local café. Dressing in layers is advisable; a light jacket would serve well against the lingering coolness of the early day, while a cozy scarf could provide comfort as temperatures shift. Engage in the mundanity of life as the city stirs, savoring the gentle rhythm that San Francisco offers in moments like these.
